definitions.body: Gadite 2Sa 23:36 (so perh. also ‖ 1Ch 11:38 where MT [[הַגְרִי]] q.v.; cf. Th Be Dr); elsewhere as n.pr. coll.: so 1Ch 5:18 (only here without art., rd. perh. [[גׇּד]] so LXX), De 3:12, De 3:16, De 4:43, De 29:7, Jos 1:12, Jos 12:6, Jos 13:8, Jos 22:1, 2Ki 10:33, 1Ch 5:26, 1Ch 12:8, 1Ch 12:37, 1Ch 26:32.
